concept.title: SDIO Implementation Quick Start
concept.shortdesc: Provides a collection of documents that describe SDIO (Secure Digital Input Output) implementation.

conbody.p: The implementation guide describes how SDIO is included in a build of the Symbian platform.
The testing guide describes techniques that can be used for testing the SDIO functionality.
The tools guide describes the tools that can be used to test an implementation of SDIO.
The build guide describes how to include the SDIO adaptation in a ROM image.
